title: about normal queue matchmaking
body: normal's matchmaking really need to be redone because its getting out of hand. I'm getting to the point where i have to play ranked sometimes just to play new champion that i have never played. I'm sure no one here that plays ranked wants a first time on a champion in ranked. Please add in something that considers their rank when you match-up people please. The way this is going its just not fun to play league anymore sadly to say
